subject: Soccer
Heart
Death and Dying
lead_paragraph: Naoki Matsuda, among Japan’s most noted players, passed away Thursday after collapsing during training, becoming one of a long line of athletes to die doing what they train to do.
snippet: Naoki Matsuda, among Japan’s most noted players, passed away Thursday after collapsing during training, becoming one of a long line of athletes to die doing what they train to do.
